## getWithFunction() function

Find the entry in the given array for which the function `f` returns true. This is a stand-in replacement for the `find` method which is available on `Array` in modern browsers, but not IE11.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getWithFunction<T>(a: ArrayLike<T>, f: (_a: T) => boolean): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | ArrayLike&lt;T&gt; | Array to search |
|  f | (\_a: T) =&gt; boolean | Predicate to use to test each entry |

<b>Returns:</b>

T

The entry for which the predicate returned true, null if not found.
